snippet: The shift to market-based funding has led to some volatility as banks have adjusted to the new environment, but long-term, it should help investors better price risk.

byline.original: By SUVASHREE DEY CHOUDHURY and SUBHADIP SIRCAR | REUTERS

lead_paragraph: The shift to market-based funding has led to some volatility as banks have adjusted to the new environment, but long-term, it should help investors better price risk.

headline.print_headline: Indian Central Bank Puts Limits on Low-Cost Cash
headline.main: Indian Central Bank Puts Limits on Low-Cost Cash
